personalInfo.name: Kelvin Githu
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer
personalInfo.summary: Full-Stack Developer specializing in SAP Business One integrations, Vue.js frontend development, and enterprise-level applications. Proven track record delivering scalable solutions with expertise in Laravel, React Native, and API integrations.

experience.description: Leading development of enterprise SAP Business One integrations and modern web applications
achievements: Implemented automated Purchase Order inventory control system preventing inventory overflow
Developed 6 major SAP B1 frontend modules using Vue.js 3
Created comprehensive Blanket Agreements system with 11 RESTful API endpoints
Streamlined procurement and inventory management processes

projects.name: ERP Purchase Order Inventory Control System
projects.description: Automated validation system that blocks Purchase Orders when inventory would exceed predefined maximum levels
features: Custom inventory threshold configurations in master data
Transaction validation automation
User-specific override capabilities for procurement managers
Real-time transaction validation
projects.impact: Prevented inventory overflow and optimized stock management organization-wide

projects.name: Partsultan Automotive Parts Sourcing Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive B2B platform for automotive parts sourcing with intelligent supplier management
features: Business messaging platform integration with automation
Multi-tier intelligent supplier escalation system
AI-powered response analysis with quality scoring
Multi-supplier broadcasting with response tracking
Smart message formatting and template management
Background job processing for async operations
projects.impact: Reduced sourcing time from hours to minutes, improved supplier response rates

projects.name: ICABS Transportation Platform
projects.description: Complete ride-sharing platform with mobile app, web dashboard, and backend infrastructure handling real-time ride matching and payment processing
features: Real-time ride matching and tracking with mapping services
Cloud-based real-time data synchronization
Comprehensive security rules and data protection
Multiple payment gateway integrations
Web dashboard for driver and admin management
Mobile app store deployment and optimization
Push notifications for ride updates and alerts
Rating and review system for drivers and passengers
projects.impact: Complete transportation solution with modern UI/UX, accessibility compliance, and successful deployment serving real users

projects.name: Enterprise ERP Frontend Modules
projects.description: Comprehensive frontend interfaces for multiple enterprise ERP modules
features: Component-based architecture for reusability
Real-time validation and error handling
Responsive design for desktop and tablet
Comprehensive state management
Payment gateway integrations
projects.impact: Streamlined ERP operations across multiple departments

projects.name: Climate Vulnerability Mapping Application
projects.description: Interactive data visualization platform for climate vulnerability analysis across African countries
features: District-level vulnerability mapping for multiple countries
Interactive geographic visualizations
Demographic participation analysis
Time series data visualization
Optimized data storage for performance
projects.impact: Enabled data-driven climate policy decisions for African regions

projects.name: Procurement Agreement Management System
projects.description: Complete procurement agreement management system with vendor and contract workflows
features: RESTful API architecture
Multi-layer validation system
Modern frontend with reactive components
Comprehensive CRUD operations

projects.name: HyddroHarvest Website
projects.description: Modern static site for water harvesting solutions company
features: Server-side rendering for performance
Responsive design implementation
SEO optimization

projects.impact: Professional web presence with optimal performance

projects.name: Conference Management Platform
projects.description: Full-stack web application for international AI/ML conference organization featuring public event information, application management, and comprehensive admin workflows
features: Public-facing event information and news system with dynamic content
Application submission and review workflow for large-scale applicants
Multi-role admin panel for content management and evaluation
Gallery system with downloadable media from multiple years
Newsletter subscription integration with automated delivery
Speaker showcase with interactive UI components
Application tracking system with status updates and notifications
Responsive design supporting all device types

projects.name: Fiscal Compliance System Integration
projects.description: Experience with fiscal compliance systems integrating ERP platforms with government-certified electronic tax registers for automated invoice processing and regulatory reporting
features: Real-time fiscal device communication and invoice transmission
Automated tax calculation and compliance reporting
Multi-device support with fallback mechanisms
Local data persistence for regulatory compliance
Integration with ERP systems for seamless workflows
Error handling and recovery for critical operations
projects.impact: Gained deep understanding of fiscal compliance requirements, government regulation integration, and enterprise-grade transaction processing systems

projects.name: Enterprise ERP System Development

features: Production module enhancements for manufacturing workflows
Material Requirements Planning implementations
Inventory management and warehouse operations
